openValidate the first document
assertTextPresentValidated

assertTextPresentCreated Successfully.
open${base_url}/foo_module/Zuite_waitForActivities

open/erp5/foo_module/view
selectAndWaitselect_actionMass Workflow Transition
assertTextlistbox_record_number2 record(s)
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[1]/a2
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[2]/aFoo
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[3]/aDraft
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[4]/aFoo Workflow
select//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[5]/selectlabel=Validate Action
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_1\']/td[1]/a1
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_1\']/td[2]/aFoo
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_1\']/td[3]/aValidated
assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_1\']/td[4]/aFoo Workflow
select//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_1\']/td[5]/selectlabel=Invalidate Action
typefield_your_commentComment !

assertText//tr[@id=\'listbox_data_line_0\']/td[2]Title 2
